channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Pocket Hose Copper Head - see why 50 million sold
channel.desc: Join TV legend Richard Karn to discover the strongest, smartest Pocket Hose yet! The Copper HeadTM features anti-burst technology, a kink-proof Force Field jacket, Tri-Tex inner tube and game-changing Pocket PivotTM for 360? freedom.
